keyword: how many calories in a michelob ultra
title: How Many Calories in a Michelob Ultra?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Michelob Ultra, including carbs, protein, sodium, and comparisons to other beers for your diet tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Michelob Ultra?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle or can; light lager beer, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand batch, serving size, and temperature; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Michelob Ultra contains 95 kcal and just 2.6 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Pour into a 16 oz pint glass (larger serving)
Add a shot of lime juice

faqs.q: How many calories in a Michelob Ultra bottle?
What are the carbs in a Michelob Ultra?
faqs.a: About 2.6 g total carbs, with 0 g sugars and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is Michelob Ultra low in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, only 5 mg sodium per bottle.

faqs.q: How does Michelob Ultra compare to other light beers?
faqs.a: It's among the lowest at 95 kcal; many light beers range 90-110 kcal.

faqs.q: Does Michelob Ultra have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.6 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.
